content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource Manager is responsible for updating Probation attribute at UPSA profile for his subordinates. In case it is not possible due to UPSA unavailability or error messages , please processed according to the article \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/Troubleshooting%20issues%20with%20applications%20supported%20by%20EPAM%20-%20Internal%20Applications%20Support.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Troubleshooting issues with applications supported by EPAM - Internal Applications Support.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\nIf RM cannot do this because of some other issues (except technical), please assign such request to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/Assignments%20to%20EPAM%20-%20Business%20Desk%20-%20UPSA%20Administration.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM – Business Desk – UPSA Administration\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB article:\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/Probation.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/Probation.aspx\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
